sentences.en: " If clear evidence, " Wilson said, " would the police prosecute? "
sentences.cn: “ 如果证据确凿, ” 威尔逊说, “ 警察局会不会检举? ”

sentences.en: Class Debate: Prosecute and Punish, or Forgive and Forget?
sentences.cn: 课堂辩论: 起诉与惩罚, 或原谅与忘记?

sentences.en: He has decided to prosecute her after careful consideration of all the relevant facts.
sentences.cn: 在认真考虑了所有相关事实后，他决定起诉她。

sentences.en: He vowed that he would prosecute them for fraud.
sentences.cn: 他郑重宣布将起诉他们犯有欺诈罪.

sentences.en: I am told I am not to prosecute you . Well , then, I will not.
sentences.cn: 他们要我不控告你, 既然如此, 我也就照他们的意思办.

sentences.en: I am trying my best to prosecute my duties.
sentences.cn: 我正在尽力履行我的职责.

sentences.en: In extreme cases, insurance companies can prosecute for fraud.
sentences.cn: 个别极端的情况下，保险公司可以欺诈罪提出起诉。

sentences.en: In view of his age, the police have decided not to prosecute.
sentences.cn: 考虑到他的年龄, 警方决定对他撤消起诉.

sentences.en: Mrs Lynn Smith, prosecuting, said the offence took place on January 27.
sentences.cn: 控方律师林恩·史密斯夫人称案件发生于1月27日。

sentences.en: Photographs taken by roadside cameras will soon be enough to prosecute drivers for speeding.
sentences.cn: 路边电子眼拍下的照片很快将足以起诉超速的司机。

sentences.en: She threatens to prosecute Tony for impeding an investigation.
sentences.cn: 她威胁将以妨碍调查起诉托尼.
在商店行窃者将被起诉。

sentences.en: The Attorney General was aware of the political implications of his decision to prosecute.
sentences.cn: 司法部长很清楚他决定起诉可能引发的政治后果。

sentences.en: The attorney who will prosecute the case says he cannot reveal how much money is involved.
sentences.cn: 将起诉这件案子的原告律师说他不能透漏涉案金额。

sentences.en: The people that took him were so willing, as well as able , to prosecute him.
sentences.cn: 抓他那班人又这么肯卖力气去告发他.

sentences.en: The police have decided not to prosecute because the evidence is not strong enough.
sentences.cn: 由于证据不足，警方已决定不起诉。

sentences.en: We cannot prosecute the investigation further.
sentences.cn: 我们无法继续调查下去。

sentences.en: We should never prosecute the innocent.
sentences.cn: 我们决不应控告无辜的人.

sentences.en: Will you be able to prosecute your responsibilities effectively?
sentences.cn: 你能有效地履行职责 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 检察官；公诉人；[法] 起诉人；实行者

trans.tran_cn: 控告，起诉，继续从事，担任控方律师
trans.tran_en: if a lawyer prosecutes a case, he or she tries to prove that the person charged with a crime is guilty
to charge someone with a crime and try to show that they are guilty of it in a court of law

trans.tran_cn: 对…提起公诉，告发，检举；继续从事
trans.tran_en: to charge someone with a crime and try to show that they are guilty of it in a court of law
